data.actual_result: GIF continue to play, even if you closed the profile
data.expected_result: GIF should stop, and restart when you reopen the profile by left-clicking on it
data.short_description: GIF profile picture continue to be played while you're not on the profile
data.steps_to_repro: - Left click on a Nitro user (profile of Mikesky#0001 is perfect to reproduce this bug), the latter SHOULD have a GIF as profile picture - wait 1-2 second - Close the pop-up - Left click on the SAME user you clicked previously
